input.description:
job ID
ID of the job.

job name
Job name of the job for which this process has been invoked.

job description [Optional]
Description for the job as entered by the operator.

job type
Job type of job.

schedule ID
If the job has a schedule defined then this input contains the schedule ID.

change ID
Change ID assigned to the job.

task ID
Task ID assigned to the job.

targets [Optional]
Comma separated list of target names assigned to the given job if BladeLogic could not retrieve the CMDB reconciliation Ids.

CI details [Optional]
List of CI Names and Reconciliation IDs of each CI to be associated with the Task.
Sample: <Configuration-Items> <Configuration-Item> <name>Persius1</name> <reconciliation-id>AS0050560C63F2rpytRAn_CoAAWI0A</reconciliation-id> </Configuration-Item> <Configuration-Item> <name>Papillon1</name> <reconciliation-id>AS0050560C63F2L0K0RAX1htAQc5YA</reconciliation-id> </Configuration-Item> <Configuration-Item> <name>ATL-cisco1720-04</name> <reconciliation-id>AG005056B51824Z4EZSQElKeAwo3sB</reconciliation-id> </Configuration-Item> </Configuration-Items>

BL user ID [Optional]
User who executes or schedules the job.

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:if test="'${success}'='success'"> <xsl:value-of select="." disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:if> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="'${success}'='success'"> <xsl:value-of select="." disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">${bl user id}</xsl:text> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> ${notes} <xsl:if test="string-length(.)>0"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no"> ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- </xsl:text> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">List of targets not mapped to CMDB:
</xsl:text> <xsl:call-template name="tokenize"> <xsl:with-param name="targets" select="." /> </xsl:call-template> </xsl:if> </value> </xsl:template> <xsl:template name="tokenize"> <xsl:param name="targets" /> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="contains($targets, ',')"> <xsl:value-of select="substring-before($targets, ',')" disable-output-escaping="no" /> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no"> </xsl:text> <xsl:call-template name="tokenize"> <xsl:with-param name="targets" select="substring-after($targets, ',')" /> </xsl:call-template> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:value-of select="$targets" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0">
  <xsl:output indent="no" />
  <xsl:template match="/">
    <value>
      <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Job ID: ${ID}
Job Name: ${name}
Job Type: ${type}
Job Description: ${desc}
Schedule ID: ${schedule ID}
Schedule Time: ${schedule time}</xsl:text>
    </value>
  </xsl:template>
</xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="yes" cdata-section-elements="location" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <Tasks> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="string-length(//task) > 0"> <xsl:copy-of select="//task" /> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise>${task}</xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </Tasks> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <Tasks> <xsl:copy-of select="./node()/*" /> <Task> <task-id>${task ID}</task-id> <instance-name>${CI name}</instance-name> </Task> </Tasks> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> ${notes} <xsl:if test="string-length(.)>0"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no"> ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- </xsl:text> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">List of targets not mapped to CMDB:
</xsl:text> <xsl:call-template name="tokenize"> <xsl:with-param name="targets" select="." /> </xsl:call-template> </xsl:if> </value> </xsl:template> <xsl:template name="tokenize"> <xsl:param name="targets" /> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="contains($targets, ',')"> <xsl:value-of select="substring-before($targets, ',')" disable-output-escaping="no" /> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no"> </xsl:text> <xsl:call-template name="tokenize"> <xsl:with-param name="targets" select="substring-after($targets, ',')" /> </xsl:call-template> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:value-of select="$targets" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0">
  <xsl:output indent="no" />
  <xsl:template match="/">
    <value>
      <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Job ID: ${ID}
Job Name: ${name}
Job Type: ${type}
Job Description: ${desc}
Schedule ID: ${schedule ID}
Schedule Time: ${schedule time}</xsl:text>
    </value>
  </xsl:template>
</xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="yes" cdata-section-elements="location" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <Tasks> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="string-length(//task) > 0"> <xsl:copy-of select="//task" /> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise>${task}</xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </Tasks> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:if test="string-length(.)>0"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no"> ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- </xsl:text> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">List of targets not mapped to CMDB:
</xsl:text> <xsl:call-template name="tokenize"> <xsl:with-param name="targets" select="." /> </xsl:call-template> </xsl:if> </value> </xsl:template> <xsl:template name="tokenize"> <xsl:param name="targets" /> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="contains($targets, ',')"> <xsl:value-of select="substring-before($targets, ',')" disable-output-escaping="no" /> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no"> </xsl:text> <xsl:call-template name="tokenize"> <xsl:with-param name="targets" select="substring-after($targets, ',')" /> </xsl:call-template> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:value-of select="$targets" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0">
  <xsl:output indent="no" />
  <xsl:template match="/">
    <value>
      <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Job ID: ${ID}
Job Name: ${name}
Job Type: ${type}
Job Description: ${desc}
Schedule ID: ${schedule ID}
Schedule Time: ${schedule time}</xsl:text>
    </value>
  </xsl:template>
</xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="yes" cdata-section-elements="location" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <Tasks> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="string-length(//task) > 0"> <xsl:copy-of select="//task" /> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise>${task}</xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </Tasks> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="string(.)='failure'"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">CI Association error: ${CI assoc status message} </xsl:text> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="'${success status}'='success'"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">ITSM ticket updated successfully</xsl:text> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">${status message}</xsl:text> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="string(.)!='success' and string(.)!='failure'"> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="string(.)='true'"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">0</xsl:text> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">1</xsl:text> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="string(.)='success'"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">0</xsl:text> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">1</xsl:text> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

documentation.description: Updates the Task ticket with job end result related information and closes or cancels the ticket based on whether the job was successfully completed / Aborted / Cancelled /deleted /Scheduled expired.
